did.unittitle: Charles Schaffner Goodman "The Location of Fashion Industries: With Special reference to California Apparel Market" on Microfilm
did.abstract: This microfilm is "A Dissertation Submitted in Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements for the Degree of Doctor of Philosophy in the University of Michigan, June 1947".

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Charles Schaffner Goodman "The Location of Fashion Industries: With Special reference to California Apparel Market" on Microfilm, #6158mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: General
odd.p: "A presentation of ... parts of... [the author's] doctoral dissertation entitled " The development of California as a manufacturing and marketing center for fashion apparel" (Ann Arbor: University Microfilms, 1948)"
